about_the_game:
Join the discord server here:

Use a custom crosshair overlay in any game! Gain a competitive advantage in your favorite games.

Features

  • Powered by GameBar for fullscreen compatibility in any game
  • Upload custom images, design your own, or choose from our library of crosshairs
  • Supports windowed and fullscreen mode
  • Keybinds to enable/disable
  • Position anywhere on the screen
  • Share your designs with the community via the Steam workshop

Pixel editor

Workshop Integration

You can browser other users' crosshair designs on the Steam workshop. If you have made a crosshair design you're proud of, you can upload it to the workshop and share it with the community.

Customization

You can also create your own designs by modifying parameters on a preset crosshair design. For each you can modify:
  • Color
  • Shape
  • Thickness
  • Center dot
  • Location
  • Size
